faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password: 1) Go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password', 2) Enter your email address, 3) Check your email for reset instructions, 4) Follow the link and create a new password. If you still have issues, contact IT support.

faqs.question: My computer is running slowly, what should I do?
faqs.answer: For slow computer performance: 1) Restart your computer, 2) Close unnecessary programs, 3) Check for Windows updates, 4) Run disk cleanup, 5) Scan for malware. If the issue persists, create a support ticket.

faqs.question: I can't connect to the office WiFi
faqs.answer: WiFi connection troubleshooting: 1) Ensure you're connecting to the correct network, 2) Verify your credentials, 3) Restart your WiFi adapter, 4) Forget and reconnect to the network, 5) Check if other devices can connect. Contact IT if the problem continues.

faqs.question: How do I install software on my work computer?
faqs.answer: Software installation process: 1) Check if the software is pre-approved in the company catalog, 2) For new software, submit a software request ticket, 3) IT will review for security and compliance, 4) Once approved, IT will install remotely or provide installation instructions.

faqs.question: I'm getting a 'Blue Screen of Death' error
faqs.answer: For BSOD errors: 1) Note the error code, 2) Restart your computer, 3) If it happens repeatedly, boot in safe mode, 4) Run memory diagnostic, 5) Update drivers. This requires immediate IT attention - create a high priority ticket with the error details.

faqs.question: How do I access company files from home?
faqs.answer: Remote access to company files: 1) Connect to company VPN using provided credentials, 2) Access files through mapped network drives or SharePoint, 3) Use company-approved cloud storage solutions, 4) Ensure your home network is secure. Contact IT for VPN setup assistance.
